title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps Review Roundup - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.10.20
description:
Tim and Greg have a HUGE news day to walk you through - reviews, Reggie, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:07 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:21 - Ori and the Will of the Wisps Reviews
00:11:11 - GameStop appoints Reggie to Board
00:14:00 - “What does this mean?” - Super
00:18:07 - Horizon is coming to PC
00:23:17 - 2K Making NFL Games Again
00:30:00 - “Both Madden and the WWE 2K games have both felt samey year after year…” - anakinjmt
00:33:43 - We’re getting another Tony Hawk?
00:39:44 - COD Warzone isn’t REALLY FTP on Xbox
00:46:23 - “Do you think Halo Infinite will have a similar mode?” - Grayling Thibodeaux
00:47:44 - Game Informer Restructuring
00:50:47 - Out today
00:57:06 -  Ads  
 Reader mail   -
01:01:33 - “Could we get a 3D Lego Mario Game, is this just a tease for Super Mario Lego sets?” - The 5 Star Man
01:03:57 - Squad Up: Gondors Condor - Xbox - Gondors Condor
01:04:53 - You‘re Wrong
01:06:52 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
